name: Wava - Hella's journey
description:
Year 2452, the galactic cleric became the strongest entity in the universe after their messiah fused her soul with the only planet left made of fresh water.

18 years have passed since the event. Two wars started and finished before anyone could even touch the clerics. Their power is overwhelming...

A rebellion is rising, but it is necessary to gather information about the clerics, so that any weakness can be spotted. There are some spies within the cleric's temple. Will they find some allies, or everyone is an enemy?

This interactive story was made as a challenge/miniJam/ where I had to finish it in three days and had to use only AI generated images. This is the first time I make one and I had lots of fun. 

For the narrative I used Fungus and Fungus repo, which I had never used before and I found it quite helpful to approach this endeavior.

All the images, as aforementioned, were generated using an AI. I don't mean to replace an artist's work, nor do I think that is the purpose of that software. I was just challenging myself: Do this project within the deadline and learn new tools throughout the process.

The AI software used:

  • Dall-e , for the backgrounds
  • Stable diffusion for the characters

Sound assets taken from:

  • https://freesound.org/people/Nathan_Lomeli/sounds/79184/
  • https://freesound.org/people/anagar/sounds/267931/
  • https://freesound.org/people/AUDACITIER/sounds/632128/
  • https://freesound.org/people/SpaceJoe/sounds/484912/
  • https://freesound.org/people/Akatukoaut/sounds/500997/
  • https://freesound.org/people/Thedust82/sounds/215639/
